subject: Poland delivery
description_text:
I don't see a delivery option for Poland. I live in Poland and don't know
if I can buy it. If I can then how is delivery free and will I have to pay
any taxes/customer duty?

conversations.body_text: Hi Szymon Szynal,     Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland  https:/fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn
